    • Method Detail

      • isUserEntityType

        public static boolean isUserEntityType(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
        Checks whether a given class used by the user (as a relation field or EnableNli) method argument) is a valid representation of a single entity.

      • getClassOfType

        @Nullable
public static java.lang.Class<?> getClassOfType(java.lang.reflect.Type type)
        Returns:
        The Class defining the class/interface of 'type' if there is one, or null if 'type' is something with no defined class/interface (i.e. GenericArrayType, TypeVariable, WildcardType). NOTE: in Java Class cannot represent an array whose elements are of a generic type. So this method returns null for GenericArrayType.

      • getUserTypeOfUserTypeCollection

        @Nullable
public static java.lang.Class<?> getUserTypeOfUserTypeCollection(java.lang.reflect.Type potentialCollectionType)
        Parameters:
        potentialCollectionType - Any non-null value is a valid input (doesn't even have to be a collection).
        Returns:
        The class of entities in 'potentialCollectionType' if it's a collection of elements of "user entity type". (see isUserEntityType(Class) Returns null in case 'potentialCollectionType': - is a user entity type (note that theoretically NliEntity might extend Collection and in this case we don't want to consider it as a collection of user entity type elements). - does not represent a Collection with a single parametrized type argument that can be represented by a Class (see getClassOfType(Type)).

      • isUserEntityTypeCollection

        public static boolean isUserEntityTypeCollection(java.lang.reflect.Type type)
        Any non-null value is a valid input

      • isUserEntityTypeOrCollectionThereof

        public static boolean isUserEntityTypeOrCollectionThereof(java.lang.reflect.Type type)

      • getUserType

        @Nullable
public static java.lang.Class<?> getUserType(java.lang.reflect.Type genericUserTypeOrCollection)
        Parameters:
        genericUserTypeOrCollection - Represents either a generic user type or a generic collection type in which the type of the elements is a user type. Or any other type (in which case null is returned).
        Returns:
        null if 'genericUserTypeOrCollection' is not a type representing a user entity type or a collection of user entity type elements. Otherwise returns the class of a single user entity type.

      • getUniqueDeterministicStringForField

        public static java.lang.String getUniqueDeterministicStringForField(java.lang.reflect.Field field)
